data.name: Hell is Others
data.detailed_description:
Support us!


Join us on Discord


About the Game

Adam Smithson lives his daily routine of work/eat/sleep/repeat, cooped up in his claustrophobic apartment listening to the never-ending repetition of songs spat out by his gramophone all day and taking care of his beloved plants. It sounds like a normal and mundane life until the need for blood forces Adam to take to the streets of Century City and leave his safe place.
Like the city itself, everyone and everything is craving blood. It’s Adam’s purpose to make it thrive, and the only way is to survive it.



KNOCK KNOCK
Adam is awakened by the unceasing knock on the door. Who’s knocking? After opening the door, no one is there. Only a Magnolia Bonsai and a letter: “Blood it. I'll be back tomorrow.”.
Who placed it there while Adam slept, why that particular plant, and most importantly, why Adam?



PVP
Stalking the same pathways you do are monsters that feel familiar to Adam, close yet so distant, maybe The Others are just like you. As fast as predator can become prey, make sure you’re using all of Adams’s senses to stay on top of the food chain.



PVE
The outside world is filled with unknowns and evils. The Things stalk every alleyway, shop door entrance and crosswalk, waiting for the perfect time to strike and rip away the valuable blood in your veins to survive, while The Others want it for a different purpose, along with all the precious items you’ve collected on your run.


BLOOD MONEY
In the dystopian world that Adam survives in, Blood isn’t only something that feeds his precious Magnolia Bonsai and the rest of his plant collection, but collect enough from Things or Others and you’ll be able to exchange it for hard cash at the Bank.
You can use your bloody money to fuel the economy of Century City. Buy new appliances and furniture for your home, or new guns to face the Things out there.



CRAFT YOUR BULLETS
Ensuring your plants grow big and healthy means a constant supply of blood is needed, but what if there was a way to grow different crops? What if enhancing crops yields better results?
By adding fertilizers to the plants, you can create a wide range of different types of bullets. Make them powerful and faster, and add unique effects like bouncing or silents. Crafting bullets have no limits besides your imagination.



BUILD YOUR SAFE PLACE
Outfit Adams' apartment with an array of new appliances to change his crumbling home into a castle for a king. A new cooker, refrigerator, or oven can make all the difference in how a home feels alongside making a difference in your playstyle.


PEOPLE OF CENTURY
Century City is the city of cities; where time and space have no meaning. The habitants crave your help, it’s your choice to fulfill or not their desires, but they will not wait for you forever.
Here everyone is in debt, and blood is scarce. Help the people of Century City, and maybe they will give you something in return.


TICK TOCK
You have a limited time to do your business once in the city. Lookup for an elevator and go back home before it’s too late, or you might just end up losing what’s in your pockets.
But watch out! You’re not the only one that wants to go back to his safe home.

data.short_description: Hell is Others is a survival horror PVPVE top-down shooter.Leave the safety of your safe house and step into Century City, a dystopian society whose economy is literally fuelled by blood. Venture into the streets to loot, explore, hunt, and thrive.
